HDG.LOG.content: gathering properly begins w/ sheltering (Bergen her eigentlich anfangende Sammeln): the vintage (die Lese) is a selection (Auslese) > most important aspect [why?] to form the vintage is the sorting (Erlesen), the fore-gathering (Vor-lese) which determines (fügt) the selection, bringing together in gathering

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]
motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

HDG.LOG.linkedContent: gathering properly begins w/ sheltering (Bergen her eigentlich anfangende Sammeln): the vintage (die Lese) is a selection (Auslese) > most important aspect [why?] to form the vintage is the sorting (Erlesen), the fore-gathering (Vor-lese) which determines (fügt) the selection, bringing together in gathering

HDG.LP.content: apartness not the desolation (Ödnis) of departed dead > stranger measures off (durchmisst) the parting (Abschied) from previous Geschlecht [mankind hitherto], he is underway on a path (Pfad) > departed, the stranger is set apart, one of the select (Erlesenen)
HDG.LP.linkedContent: apartness not the desolation (Ödnis) of departed dead > stranger measures off (durchmisst) the parting (Abschied) from previous Geschlecht [mankind hitherto], he is underway on a path (Pfad) > departed, the stranger is set apart, one of the select (Erlesenen)
